name: Taleblazer
description:
Kai was given a simple task, catch a fish for Grandma Rose. But, there’s still a lot of time before dinner, why not go out and explore? Discover the small and tall tales of Silvertip Isle.

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Mouse - Look
  • Left Mouse Button - Interact

Use Alt+F4 to quit the game!
